content.rendered:
Professional Experience And Certificates
Since 01.09.2017
Full-stack Developer at CERN (The European Organization for Nuclear Research / Conseil Européen pour la Recherche Nucléaire)
The scope of my duties includes maintaining and creating new progressive web apps for our section.
The most interesting project was to design and develop from the beginning new alarm system for CERN Control Centre in Vue.js, Typescript, Bootstrap 4 and Spring Boot.

 

Front-end and mobile technology stack: Typescript, Javascript ES6, Vue.js, Vue@CLI, AngularJS, React/Redux, jQuery, Bootstrap, Material Design, Primefaces, JSF, React Native, Ionic, Mapbox, ArcGIS.

Back-end technology stack and databases: Java, Spring Boot, Spring Security, Spring Data, Websockets, Oracle, MySQL.

Office located in Prévessin-Moëns (France), next to Geneva.

01.03.2015 – 28.02.2017
Front-end and Back-end Developer at CERN (The European Organization for Nuclear Research / Conseil Européen pour la Recherche Nucléaire)
Responsible for creating new progressive web apps in Angular 2 and Oracle Apex for Access Distribution and Management System. The application has to work for every user, regardless of browser choice, fit any form factor like desktop, mobile, tablet, enhanced with service workers to work offline or on low quality networks and make users feel that they are using an application, not a website.

Demo from my presentation about Angular 2.

 

Programming languages & frameworks: Angular 2, Zurb Foundation 6, Spring Boot, Oracle Application Express, PL/SQL, HTML5, CSS3, getSkeleton, Metro UI CSS, SASS and jQuery 3.

Office located in Meyrin (Switzerland), next to Geneva.

01.04.2014 – 28.02.2015
Front-end and Back-end Developer at Mayersche Buchhandlung
Developed new modules in PHP for OXID e-commerce platform.

Programming languages & frameworks: OXID, PHP, MySQL, ElasticSearch, HTML5, CSS3, Zurb Foundation and JavaScript.
Office located in Aachen (Germany).

14.11.2013 – 01.03.2015
Magento Developer
I worked remotly as a Magento programmer to set up new shops and customize them for the German market using PHP, MySQL, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (jQuery, AngularJS).
Moreover, I administrated more than 20 Magento stores.

Programming languages & technologies: PHP, MySQL, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (including frameworks: jQuery, AngularJS).

01.11.2013 – 31.03.2014
Front-end and Back-end Developer at Institut Für Kultur Und Medien “Polonicus”
I worked as an administrator and web programmer, developing new websites and web platforms, and maintaining network administration.
Office located in Aachen (Germany).
01.06.2013 – 31.08.2013
Mobile and Web Software Developer at “enwani”
I programmed mobile applications and websites in HTML5, CSS3 (framework: Bootstrap), JavaScript (AngularJS), Trigger.io for Android and iOS. As part of a multicultural team I created applications to help deliverers find customers’ addresses in an easy way. “enwani” collaborates with IKEA in Saudi Arabia. Office located in Aachen (Germany).
01.10.2012 – 31.01.2013
Course and laboratory “iPhone Application Programming” 
Course organized by RWTH Aachen University, including Objective-C programming for iOS6 operating system.
01.04.2012 – 31.01.2013
Project “Virtual laboratory”
Supported by RWTH Aachen University and Warsaw University of Technology. The main task of the project was to develop an application which uses a motion sensing input device, a Kinect, to control virtual electrical engineering devices implemented in an augmented reality. Written in C# in .net environment and Kinect SDK.
01.04.2012 – 31.07.2012
Internship Mobile & Locations Based Augmented Reality 
Organized by RWTH Aachen University, including Android programming, C# programming in .net environment and Kinect SDK.
11.10.2011 – 02.02.2012
Course and laboratory Web Technologies
Course organized by RWTH Aachen University.
01.10.2011 – 31.01.2012
Workshops “TPT29 – Mobile application development” on ParisTech University 
Workshops including Android SDK programming course.
01.02.2011 – 30.04.2012
Junior developer at Groupon Poland
Responsible for writing web crawlers in PHP and MySQL. The scripts were running on the server and their task was to download source code of specific websites, analyze them, collect information and store them in databases.
01.09.2007 – 22.02.2011
Internship in “Rap-Projekt” Sp. z o.o.
Faculty: Electrical Engineering, graduated in 2011
01.04.2010 – 30.06.2010
Internship in “Misal-System”
Web Application Developer
05.12.2009
Certificate Flex Challenge Academic Tour
Workshops on Adobe Flex and Adobe AIR.
2009
English B2 exam at Warsaw University of Technology
2007 – 2011
Contract work
Creation of online auction layouts and websites (in Photoshop), templates for Joomla and WordPress.
